ComicInfo.Title: Submerged Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Submerged pt 2
With water training completed, Tart Acid and her two Toxic teammates set off to explore the most haunted waterway in the world. Truk Lagoon holds the bodies of hundreds of soldiers lost in WWII. Does it hold something even more dangerous?
For years, demons have popped in and out of the time stream in a bid to throw the history of the world into chaos. One group, the Toxic Fruit, fights to protect the order of the world. After completing a training mission in the fabled Truk Lagoon, Tart Acid, Gloom Tangerine and Lemon La Morgue set off to investigate the world's most haunted waterway.
